name: Verify that user receives error for invalid python code for Squares of a Sorted Array Question

steps.name: Given  The user is logged into the DS Algo Portal with valid credentials
When  The user clicks the Get Started button in Array Panel
Then  The user should be navigated to the Array page
Given  The user is on the try Editor page for Squares of a Sorted Array practice question
When  The user clicks Run button with invalidcode from sheetname "tryEditorCode" and row 1
Then  The user should able to see an error message in output window
